description: Lists all tags that have been added to a resource (either an entity or change set).

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: Required. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) associated with the resource you want to list tags on.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: Required. The ARN associated with the resource you want to list tags on.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Required. A list of objects specifying each key name and value. Number of objects allowed: 1-50.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key associated with the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value associated with the tag.
